        public static StringBinding joinList(ObservableList<?> items,
                                     String delimiter)
        Creates a string binding that constructs a sequence of characters separated by a delimiter.
        Parameters:
        items - the observable list of items.
        delimiter - the sequence of characters to be used between each element.
        Returns:
        a string binding.

                                         String delimiter,
                                         Function<? super T,String> mapper)
        Creates a string binding that constructs a sequence of characters separated by a delimiter.
        Parameters:
        items - the observable list of items.
        delimiter - the sequence of characters to be used between each element.
        mapper - a non-interfering, stateless function to apply to the each element.
        Returns:
        a string binding.

        Creates a number binding that computes the maximum value amongst elements.
        Parameters:
        items - the observable list of items.
        supplier - a Supplier whose result is returned if no value is present.
        mapper - a non-interfering, stateless function to apply to the each element.
        Returns:
        a number binding
